fr.upmc.alasca.computer.connectors

Class ComputerConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.upmc.alasca.computer.connectors.ComputerConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComputerProviderI, ConnectorI, ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, RequiredI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ComputerConnector
extends AbstractConnector
implements ComputerProviderI
    La classe ComputerConnector implemente un connecteur entre un Controleur et un Computer
